data.author: Abildgard

changelog.release_notes: Settings now available from the Pebble app.
On color Pebbles the letters Q and W is now dimmed.
Black background on older Pebbles works again.
Battery percentage when charging on Time now black instead of dark blue.
Blue background on top and bottom sections.
Unwated vibration in some cases removed.
Vibration at bluetooth state change now works again.

Invert colors by shaking your wrist at startup (x flashes). 
Bluetooth x fixed on Pebble Time - only shows when connection lost.
Fullly charged battery now says "100" instead of "10..."
Tiny adjustments to bluetooth and day's date positions.

- Date format now always four digits (e.g. 20/09 and 01/12) to keep its alignment.
- The day's date is now bold to better stand out.

- Battery now updates more often and inverts when charging.
- Text alignment adjusted slighty.
Now shows an x when bluetooth is lost (instead of inverted battery).

Horizontal lines re-added.
Battery only inverts when BT off/lost.
Month name now before date.

data.description:
Displays quarter, week number, battery percentage (inverted when charging), weekday, month name, date, 24h time and shows an x while bluetooth connection is off / lost and vibrates.

In its settings you can invert the colors and enable that shaking your wrist at startup will invert colors (while x blinks) on the fly.

Known bug: Settings page isn't working on iOS (only on Android) - we're looking into it.

Updates: We're considering a new "clean" mode (an option in Settings) where only the clock is shown and the date, week etc. are only visible for 5 seconds if you shake your wrist.


Design: David Filskov
Programming: Thor Muto Asmund

latest_release.release_notes: Settings now available from the Pebble app.

data.title: Quarter Week
